name: Fix login bug
description: Resolve issue with incorrect password validation on the login page.

name: Add search filter
description: Implement category and date filters for the task search feature.

name: Update user profile UI
description: Redesign the user profile layout for better mobile experience.

name: Optimize image loading
description: Use lazy loading to improve page performance and reduce bandwidth.

description: Add Jest tests for the authentication and API service modules.

description: Allow users to switch between light and dark themes in settings.

description: Correct alignment and dropdown issues in the navbar on smaller screens.

name: Add notifications
description: Implement push notification system for task updates and messages.

name: Refactor API calls
description: Move all fetch requests into a centralized API utility file.

name: Create onboarding flow
description: Design and code a step-by-step onboarding guide for new users.
